p:
Literature is scarce in relation to the effects of EPA on macrophage polarization. Fat-1 transgenic mice (animals that endogenously produce ω-3 fatty acids from ω-6) fed a 60% calorie high-fat diet (HFD) during 10 weeks showed reduced recruitment of pro-inflammatory M1 and increased anti-inflammatory M2 macrophages to adipose tissue
32 . These effects were associated with suppression of multiple kinases, such as IkB kinase, AKT, and focal adhesion kinase
32 .
